document.full_text: authorities seized the tusks of 58 elephants, a ton of ivory, after sniffer dogs led investigators to containers at the country's main airport, officials said friday.
document.title: africa: kenya: tusks of 58 elephants seized
lines_and_colors: authorities seized the tusks of 58 elephants, a ton of ivory, after sniffer dogs led investigators to containers at the country's main airport, officials said friday.
